children.text: Delivering web services within the digital marketing space to over 20 businesses across the Americas.
Collaborating with stakeholders on business requirements, IT teams on server-side management, and contractors on website management and updates.
Offering expertise in data analytics, performance optimization, SEO, form creation, content management, and cookie consent integration to enhance web functionality and user experience.

Coordinating website updates and translations for 4 multilingual Drupal-based corporate sites across the US, Canada, Brazil, and Colombia, ensuring smooth communication and alignment with stakeholders.
Supporting 18+ WordPress sites and 4 multilingual Drupal sites, ensuring optimal performance and seamless user experiences.
Overseeing project management processes, including tracking hours, updating tasks, and managing salary allocations to ensure accurate budgeting and resource distribution.

I am a skilled full-stack web developer, specializing in WordPress. I have extensive experience customizing themes, building plugins, and integrating various APIs to enhance site functionality and user experience.

As a front-end developer, I focus on a mobile-first approach with fallbacks for older browsers. I am proficient in advanced CSS techniques such as Flexbox, Grid, and CSS pre-processors, and I leverage modern tools like React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to create high-performance, responsive web applications.

With hands-on experience in building modern, scalable web applications using React, I have developed a strong understanding of its ecosystem and best practices. I focus on creating dynamic, high-performance user interfaces and have started integrating React into smaller-scale projects.

I've earned the prestigious distinction of a Summa Cum Laude graduate in Computer Science. My studies have contributed to my knowledge of web and software development. I have a deep understanding of machine code and database systems.

With 10 years of experience using MySQL, I have developed expertise in database design, writing complex queries, and optimizing performance. I completed three advanced database courses, which strengthened my foundation in database engineering across various programming languages and database types. I am proficient in designing optimized databases, integrating prepared statements into web applications, and ensuring secure and efficient data management across multiple projects.

I'm familiar with algorithm analysis, discrete math, locks, programming paradigms, mutliple programming languages, database design, data structures, software engineering processes, and human-computer interaction (UX/UI).
